quote.words: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.
quote.author: Audrey Hepburn

quote.words: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quote.author: Dalai Lama

quote.words: If you want to be happy, be.
quote.author: Leo Tolstoy

quote.words: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.words: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
quote.author: Loretta Young

quote.words: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
quote.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr

quote.words: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quote.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr

quote.words: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quote.author: Max Muller

quote.words: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
quote.author: William Shakespeare

quote.words: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
quote.author: George MacDonald

quote.words: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
quote.author: Stephen King

quote.words: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.
quote.author: Charles Spurgeon

quote.words: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
quote.author: Martin Luther King, Jr

quote.words: Hope is a waking dream.
quote.author: Aristotle

quote.words: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future.
quote.author: Robert H. Schuller

quote.words: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best.
quote.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote.words: The word 'happiness' would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
quote.author: Carl Jung

quote.words: We never taste a perfect joy; our happiest successes are mixed with sadness. Pierre Corneille
quote.author: Audrey Hepburn

quote.words: You get used to sadness, growing up in the mountains, I guess.
quote.author: Loretta Lynn

quote.words: The walls we build around us to keep sadness out also keeps out the joy.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.words: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
quote.author: Kelly Clarkson

quote.words: Its not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it.
quote.author: Hans Selye

quote.words: Stress is nothing more than a socially acceptable form of mental illness.
quote.author: Richard Carlson

quote.words: The main way to reduce stress in the workplace is by picking the right people.
quote.author: Jesse Schell

quote.words: The only thing an actor owes his public is not to bore them.
quote.author: Marlon Brando

quote.words: The secret of being a bore... is to tell everything.
quote.author: Voltaire

quote.words: A bore is a person who opens his mouth and puts his feats in it.
quote.author: Henry Ford

quote.words: Perhaps the world's second worst crime is boredom. The first is being a bore.
quote.author: Jean Baudrillard

quote.words: The time will come when it will disgust you to look in the mirror.
quote.author: Rose Kennedy

quote.words: Sameness is the mother of disgust, variety the cure.
quote.author: Petrarch

quote.words: The greatest pleasures are only narrowly separated from disgust.
quote.author: Marcus Cicero

quote.words: If there is a God, the phrase that must disgust him is - holy war.
quote.author: Steve Allen
